table_caption: Peak coordinates of 18 selected RSNs. The MNI (Montreal Neurological Institute) coordinates show the coordinates of the peak voxels with negative x coordinates refer to left hemisphere activations. Brodmann’s area as indicated by the cytoarchitectonic maximum probability map using the SPM-Anatomy toolbox developed by Eickhoff, et al. (2005) [49]. The quality index (Iq) associated with each component is listed in parentheses next to the component number
